page.title: 17INDUSTRY CIVIL ENGINEERING
page.content: ASFARE LTD. WOLVEY HEATH. ASfare Ltd. was established in 1978 as a small company employimg only five people. Since then the company has grown but it remains small enough to be a reliable and personal service. The company is a civil engineering company, it does road surface, road planning and surface dressing.It is one of the best equiped companies nationwide. The machines they have to do the jobs are: sweepers. J.C.B., tipper lorries, low loaders, lorry mounted infra red heater, planer hire, 3 PF90,s, paving machines,1Bk 16, rollers, chipping machines, gritters. The company's business comes from witnin a fifty mile radius. Asfare Ltd has been based in Wolvey Heath forthree years. The company employs about forty workers.
